comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content:
This photo is taken next to the Old Iron Pier. If you look carefully at the below photo, you'll notice the same design of arches on the pier. And if you look far to the left, right next to the main building, you'll see the pattern of three curved arches followed by a section with the main building roof coming down from above. The family was sitting all the way up there.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/83979593@N00/5832942111]

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On July 13, 2011, Rob Ketcherside suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!
